resources.string: Welcome to the official Bill Miller Bar-B-Q App! Made by Riley Marfin
This is our holiday menu. We cater for office parties and family meals!
9 - 11 lbs. (raw weight) Turkey Hen (cooked and chilled) with 1/2 gallon Cornbread Dressing (ready to be baked) and 1 quart Giblet Gravy (ready to be heated) ... $42.99
17 - 19 lbs. (raw weight) Turkey Tom (cooked and chilled) with 1 gallon Cornbread Dressing (ready to be baked) and 1/2 gallon Giblet Gravy (ready to be heated) ... $74.99

Turkey Hen, HOT AND CARVED - or - 3.5 lbs. Sliced Turkey Breast (HOT), 2 quarts cornbread dressing, 1 quart giblet gravy, 2 quarts green beans OR 2 quarts mashed potatoes, 1 dozen dinner rolls, 1 9" fresh baked pie, 1 bucket iced tea, plates, cups and set ups for 10 (Only $8.50 per person + tax) ... $85.00

Turkey Tom - or - 1/2 Honey-glazed spiral cut ham, HOT AND CARVED - or - 7 lbs. Sliced Turkey Breast (HOT), 4 quarts cornbread dressing, 2 quarts giblet gravy, 4 quarts green beans OR 4 quarts mashed potatoes, 2 dozen dinner rolls, 2 9" fresh baked pies, 2 buckets iced tea, plates, cups and set ups for 20\n(Only $7.50 per person + tax) ... $150.0
